approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The user shall be able to input a text description for the task.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user.

requirements.title: Application Load Time
requirements.description: The application shall load quickly.

requirements.title: Security Implementation
requirements.description: The application shall be secure.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user.

requirements.title: Application Load Time
requirements.description: The application shall load quickly.

requirements.title: Security Implementation
requirements.description: The application shall be secure.

extracted_requirements.title: Create Task
extracted_requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The user shall be able to input a text description for the task.

extracted_requirements.title: View Task List
extracted_requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user.

extracted_requirements.title: Create Task
extracted_requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The user shall be able to input a text description for the task.

extracted_requirements.title: View Task List
extracted_requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user.

original_functional_requirements.title: Create Task
original_functional_requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The user shall be able to input a text description for the task.
acceptance_criteria: A text input field is present for task description.
A button or action exists to submit the task.
Upon submission, the task is saved and visible in the task list (REQ-002).
The system provides feedback (e.g., success message) after task creation.

original_functional_requirements.title: View Task List
original_functional_requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user.
acceptance_criteria: All created tasks are displayed.
Tasks are displayed in a clear and readable format.
The task list is updated immediately after a new task is created (REQ-001).
The task list is displayed upon application startup.

original_non_functional_requirements.title: Application Load Time
acceptance_criteria: The application's initial page load time shall be less than 2 seconds.
Subsequent page loads (e.g., after task creation) shall be less than 1 second.
Performance testing will be conducted on a standard hardware configuration (specify hardware).

original_non_functional_requirements.title: Security Implementation
acceptance_criteria: User data (task descriptions) shall be stored securely (e.g., encrypted at rest).
The application shall protect against common web vulnerabilities (e.g., XSS, CSRF).
Authentication and authorization mechanisms shall be implemented to prevent unauthorized access (if user accounts are required).
Regular security audits and penetration testing will be performed.
